function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Relaxation of restrictions and social distancing measures without proper precautions","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overwhelming news exposure and reliance on tv and internet for information may impact participants’ understanding of covid-19 and influence their behaviors.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of evidence-based best practices for mitigating the effects of the pandemic","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures in building design","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid dispersal of covid-19 from wuhan due to travel","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Quality-related concerns over drug efficacy, safety, and surveillance for malaria prevention","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interaction between bacteria and gbns containing surfaces","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Coronavirus can spread through fecal-oral routes, requiring proper management of urban water cycle","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Informal signs printed on paper with regular tape may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly handled or disposed.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in confinement of covid-19 patients","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room uv in protecting health care workers from airborne infection","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient response to the pvp5 indicator in the well criteria","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High airflow rates without increased outside air fraction can increase transmission potential of contagious diseases","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research on factors influencing ppe production, distribution, and usage","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on surfaces","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stress and burnout among healthcare providers","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare capacity","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of incomplete evaporation of respiratory droplets in the environment","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased risk of sudden cardiac death","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited capacity to protect occupants from virus transmission through surfaces and by air in existing residential buildings.","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowding in lifts","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unidentified health and safety protocols during interactions with interviewees from various companies and organizations","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited use of vaccines for diseases like dengue due to safety concerns may hinder effective disease control and prevention.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of mask-wearing may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases
